column4: hi i got this in a Pm on IRC -dmwaters- {global notice} Good day folks, We apologize for the stability issues at the moment, it appears that we have a kiddie who wants to play some rather nasty games. I thank you for your patience, and thank you for using freenode!
can anyone tell me why and who it is?
it was probably sent by the staff of freenode... freenode got very glitchy/buggy for a bit an hour or so ago.. i got knocked off 2-3x
